 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new full-screen handler for an element.
 19  * 
 20  * @class A utility class for making an element "full screen", or as close to that
 21  * as browser security allows. If the browser supports the <code>requestFullScreen</code>
 22  * API - as standard or as <code>moz</code>- or <code>webkit</code>- extensions,
 23  * this will be used.
 24  *
 25  * @param {HTMLElement} container the element that is to be made full screen
 26  */
 27 bigshot.FullScreen = function (container) {
 28     this.container = container;
 29     
 30     this.isFullScreen = false;
 31     this.savedBodyStyle = null;
 32     this.savedParent = null;
 33     this.savedSize = null;
 34     this.expanderDiv = null;
 35     this.restoreSize = false;
 36     
 37     this.onCloseHandlers = new Array ();
 38     this.onResizeHandlers = new Array ();
 39     
 40     var findFunc = function (el, list) {
 41         for (var i = 0; i < list.length; ++i) {
 42             if (el[list[i]]) {
 43                 return list[i];
 44             }
 45         }
 46         return null;
 47     };
 48     
 49     this.requestFullScreen = findFunc (container, ["requestFullScreen", "mozRequestFullScreen", "webkitRequestFullScreen"]);
 50     this.cancelFullScreen = findFunc (document, ["cancelFullScreen", "mozCancelFullScreen", "webkitCancelFullScreen"]);
 51     
 52     this.restoreSize = this.requestFullScreen != null;
 53 }
 54 
 55 bigshot.FullScreen.prototype = {
 56     browser : new bigshot.Browser (),
 57     
 58     getRootElement : function () {
 59         return this.div;
 60     },
 61     
 62     /**
 63      * Adds a function that will run when exiting full screen mode.
 64      *
 65      * @param {function()} onClose the function to call
 66      */
 67     addOnClose : function (onClose) {
 68         this.onCloseHandlers.push (onClose);
 69     },
 70     
 71     /**
 72      * Notifies all <code>onClose</code> handlers.
 73      *
 74      * @private
 75      */
 76     onClose : function () {
 77         for (var i = 0; i < this.onCloseHandlers.length; ++i) {
 78             this.onCloseHandlers[i] ();
 79         }
 80     },
 81     
 82     /**
 83      * Adds a function that will run when the element is resized.
 84      *
 85      * @param {function()} onResize the function to call
 86      */
 87     addOnResize : function (onResize) {
 88         this.onResizeHandlers.push (onResize);
 89     },
 90     
 91     /**
 92      * Notifies all resize handlers.
 93      *
 94      * @private
 95      */
 96     onResize : function () {
 97         for (var i = 0; i < this.onResizeHandlers.length; ++i) {
 98             this.onResizeHandlers[i] ();
 99         }
100     },
101     
102     /**
103      * Begins full screen mode.
104      */
105     open : function () {
106         this.isFullScreen = true;
107         
108         if (this.requestFullScreen) {
109             return this.openRequestFullScreen ();
110         } else {
111             return this.openCompat ();
112         }
113     },
114     
115     /**
116      * Makes the element really full screen using the <code>requestFullScreen</code>
117      * API.
118      *
119      * @private
120      */
121     openRequestFullScreen : function () {
122         this.savedSize = {
123             width : this.container.style.width,
124             height : this.container.style.height
125         };
126         
127         this.container.style.width = "100%";
128         this.container.style.height = "100%";
129         
130         var that = this;
131         
132         if (this.requestFullScreen == "mozRequestFullScreen") {
133             /**
134              * @private
135              */
136             var errFun = function () {
137                 that.container.removeEventListener ("mozfullscreenerror", errFun);
138                 that.isFullScreen = false;
139                 that.exitFullScreenHandler ();
140                 that.onClose ();
141             };
142             this.container.addEventListener ("mozfullscreenerror", errFun);
143             
144             /**
145              * @private
146              */
147             var changeFun = function () {
148                 if (document.mozFullScreenElement !== that.container) {
149                     document.removeEventListener ("mozfullscreenchange", changeFun);
150                     that.exitFullScreenHandler ();
151                 } else {
152                     that.onResize ();
153                 }
154             };
155             document.addEventListener ("mozfullscreenchange", changeFun);
156         } else {
157             /**
158              * @private
159              */
160             var changeFun = function () {
161                 if (document.webkitCurrentFullScreenElement !== that.container) {
162                     that.container.removeEventListener ("webkitfullscreenchange", changeFun);
163                     that.exitFullScreenHandler ();
164                 } else {
165                     that.onResize ();
166                 }
167             };
168             this.container.addEventListener ("webkitfullscreenchange", changeFun);
169         }
170         
171         this.exitFullScreenHandler = function () {
172             if (that.isFullScreen) {
173                 that.isFullScreen = false;
174                 document[that.cancelFullScreen]();
175                 if (that.restoreSize) {
176                     that.container.style.width = that.savedSize.width;
177                     that.container.style.height = that.savedSize.height;
178                 }
179                 that.onResize ();
180                 that.onClose ();
181             }
182         };
183         this.container[this.requestFullScreen]();
184     },
185     
186     /**
187      * Makes the element "full screen" in older browsers by covering the browser's client area.
188      * 
189      * @private
190      */
191     openCompat : function () {
192         this.savedParent = this.container.parentNode;
193         
194         this.savedSize = {
195             width : this.container.style.width,
196             height : this.container.style.height
197         };
198         this.savedBodyStyle = document.body.style.cssText;
199         
200         document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
201         
202         this.expanderDiv = document.createElement ("div");
203         this.expanderDiv.style.position = "absolute";
204         this.expanderDiv.style.top = "0px";
205         this.expanderDiv.style.left = "0px";
206         this.expanderDiv.style.width = Math.max (window.innerWidth, document.documentElement.clientWidth) + "px";
207         this.expanderDiv.style.height = Math.max (window.innerHeight, document.documentElement.clientHeight) + "px";
208         
209         document.body.appendChild (this.expanderDiv);
210         
211         this.div = document.createElement ("div");
212         this.div.style.position = "fixed";
213         this.div.style.top = window.pageYOffset + "px";
214         this.div.style.left = window.pageXOffset + "px";
215         
216         this.div.style.width = window.innerWidth + "px";
217         this.div.style.height = window.innerHeight + "px";
218         this.div.style.zIndex = 9998;
219         
220         this.div.appendChild (this.container);
221         
222         //this.container.style.width = window.innerWidth + "px";
223         //this.container.style.height = window.innerHeight + "px";
224         
225         document.body.appendChild (this.div);
226         
227         var that = this;
228         var resizeHandler = function (e) {
229             setTimeout (function () {
230                     that.div.style.width = window.innerWidth + "px";
231                     that.div.style.height = window.innerHeight + "px";                    
232                     setTimeout (function () {
233                             that.onResize ();
234                         }, 1);
235                 }, 1);
236         };
237         
238         
239         var rotationHandler = function (e) {
240             that.expanderDiv.style.width = Math.max (window.innerWidth, document.documentElement.clientWidth) + "px";
241             that.expanderDiv.style.height = Math.max (window.innerHeight, document.documentElement.clientHeight) + "px";
242             setTimeout (function () {
243                     that.div.style.top = window.pageYOffset + "px";
244                     that.div.style.left = window.pageXOffset + "px";
245                     that.div.style.width = window.innerWidth + "px";
246                     that.div.style.height = window.innerHeight + "px";
247                     setTimeout (function () {
248                             that.onResize ();
249                         }, 1);
250                 }, 1);
251         };
252         
253         var escHandler = function (e) {
254             if (e.keyCode == 27) {
255                 that.exitFullScreenHandler ();
256             }
257         };
258         
259         this.exitFullScreenHandler = function () {
260             that.isFullScreen = false;
261             that.browser.unregisterListener (document, "keydown", escHandler);
262             that.browser.unregisterListener (window, "resize", resizeHandler);
263             that.browser.unregisterListener (document.body, "orientationchange", rotationHandler);
264             if (that.restoreSize) {
265                 that.container.style.width = that.savedSize.width;
266                 that.container.style.height = that.savedSize.height;
267             }     
268             
269             document.body.style.cssText = that.savedBodyStyle;
270             
271             that.savedParent.appendChild (that.container);
272             document.body.removeChild (that.div);
273             document.body.removeChild (that.expanderDiv);
274             
275             that.onResize ();            
276             that.onClose ();
277             setTimeout (function () {
278                     that.onResize ();
279                 }, 1);
280         };
281         
282         this.browser.registerListener (document, "keydown", escHandler, false);
283         this.browser.registerListener (window, "resize", resizeHandler, false);
284         this.browser.registerListener (document.body, "orientationchange", rotationHandler, false);
285         
286         this.onResize ();
287         
288         return this.exitFullScreenHandler;
289     },
290     
291     /**
292      * Ends full screen mode.
293      */
294     close : function () {
295         this.exitFullScreenHandler ();
296     }
297 };
298 
299
